S

setLogFile(ISimulationLogger) - Method in interface japrc2017.io.ISimulationIO
Tells the simulation to log all airprox events to the supplied ISimulationLoader
setMapDimensions(int, int) - Method in interface japrc2017.ISimulation
Sets the dimensions of the simulated world, in grid squares.
setReplayLogFile(OutputStream) - Method in interface japrc2017.IReplay
Tells the ISimulation to log all observable flight events to the supplied stream, ready for later replay.
setSpeed(double) - Method in interface japrc2017.IPlane
Sets the speed multiplier of the plane.
setTakeOffProbability(double) - Method in interface japrc2017.IAirport
Sets the probability per tick that a new plane will take-off from this airport (except at night, when no planes may take-off)
setTickDelay(int) - Method in interface japrc2017.ISimulation
Sets the delay between ticks when the simulation is running continuously (after a start() command).
SimulationEvent - Class in japrc2017.event
An event containing the source of the event.
SimulationEvent(ISimulation) - Constructor for class japrc2017.event.SimulationEvent
 
SimulationException - Exception in japrc2017
 
SimulationException(String) - Constructor for exception japrc2017.SimulationException
 
SimulationListener - Interface in japrc2017.event
 
start() - Method in interface japrc2017.ISimulation
Starts the simulator running continuously, at a rate determined by the most recent call to setTickDelay(), and returns.
